comment.author: 7711591@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Jewish People and History - Ancient and Modern, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 17643926@N00
comment._content: A shabbily dressed man probably exhausted from working at a sweatshop. He no doubt lived in a crowded tenement, so he's better off resting on a park bench.

comment.author: 87387950@N00
comment._content: Bearded young Jewish worker napping.  Definitely a fave.  I just wish the Yom Kippur collection this came from had a lot more candid photos like this.
